securityQuestions._comment: === TWO FACTOR AUTH METHOD: App, SMS, Call ===

twoFactorAuth._comment: === TWO FACTOR AUTH METHOD: App, SMS, Call ===

0._comment: checks whether user account input field is present, if yes it takes to the form else we go to '1'

1._comment: clicks on Use another account link. Note: It's hard to get stable Xpath (has no unique identifier)

select2faMethod._comment: when user has more than one 2fa method active and first method in the list is disabled user has to select 2fa method

2fa._comment: handles different types of 2 factor verification (each will have input field with unique id)

verifySuccess2fa._comment: Verify whether 2fa was successful or user returned to previous step

select2faMethod2._comment: select 2fa method on authentication which occurs before password change

2fa2._comment: pause on 2fa authentication which occurs before password change

verifySuccess2fa2._comment: Verify whether 2fa was successful or user returned to previous step

0bac._comment: fills new password in input fields

saveChangedPassword._comment: Button is hard to get stable X-path (has generated classes)

Actions._comment: This workaround is needed, because onError handler cannot handle completed corectly

solveCaptcha._comment: Loop is needed in case the user enters incorrect captcha.

changePasswordForm._comment: There are two types of forms for change password, in one of them the //*[@id='confirmpw'] is not present

startPage._comment: Check if it is a one step or two step login form

checkIfLoggedIn._comment: Most of the time captcha and two factor do not show up, trying to speed up the process by jumping over the unnecessary steps

verify2faSuccess._comment: This is necessary in case that user enters wrong TFA code.

goToCompleted._comment: This workaround is necessary becaouse onErrorGoToPage -> completed doesn't work

changePasswordForm._comment: Fill empty string first so we prevent safari keychain to open popup.

verifySuccess._comment: This is required because the selector //*[contains(@id,'RewardsMessagesBox')]/*[contains(@class,'success')] doesnt work in ege at the moment.

changePasswordForm._comment: Fill empty string first so we prevent safari keychain to open popup.

changePasswordError._comment: Fail if success message was not displayed

handle_hidden_recaptcha._comment: Handle reCaptcha. It rarely comes if user try multiple wrong attempt

handleOTPorTFA._comment: Quick security check. It also comes rarely

unknownError._comment: Verify and save changed password to vault

verifyChangePasswordCompleted._comment: Checking form field, If exist then its failure else success)

clickLogoutButton._comment: Sometimes the site redirects user to homepage, if so, click to login

finishLogout._comment: Trying to logout if logged in

loginFormB._comment: Trying to fill login credentials here in opened login page

goToChangePasswordForm._comment: Opening password change page after login

verifyPasswordChanged._comment: Verify and save changed password to vault

goToLogin._comment: Sometimes the site redirects user to homepage, if so, click to login

submitPassword._comment: The timeout is needed because the button is clickable instantly, even when the site hasn't processed the field.
